content:
senators get two or more major committee assignments - there are only 100 senators but same number of committees so more than one committee has to go to each senator
power is not very hierarchical

senators also vote more freely from their party
	their vote is very important since there is only so many of them like compared to the house
	(if house members did that their whips would go craaaazy)

there is no limit on the debate in the senate so it tends to act more slowly compared the house

senate more prestigious than the house

senators cannot be impeached but censured or expelled by their own members with 2/3rds vote
